body_html:
I tried installing it using peterjc123's conda repo but download is so slow that it gets to 1kb/s and doesn't download. I'm on a 50mbps connection still this happened. I tried using tar.bz2 file but it gave uncompressing errors. So I was wondering if I can do it manually by cloning or something?
Let me know.
